archimate:BusinessProcess.name: (L2)(h160) Collect data to prepare activity
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Problem: not all data are digitalized. Consequently, one of the difficulties is to compile, prepare & collect all information required to prepare the activities. Problem: not all data are in the PLM. Different sources of information: PLM & Doc Management for the specification. The configuration is directly provided by the SDR (System Design Responsible).
